comments.content:
When using the ant task to compile javascript files, if no files have changed, no compilation is done.

Sometimes I want to recompile the files anyway (for example, to get a list of warnings again.)

I have written a patch which adds a 'forceRecompile' option to the ant task, which enables this.

Have you signed a Contributors License Agreement as listed here?

http://code.google.com/p/closure-compiler/source/browse/trunk/CONTRIBUTORS
I'm currently waiting for the company I work for to look into the CLA.
I have just faxed the CLA to Google.
John: Can you verify this for me?
what's the name on the CLA?
ok, you're good to go. thanks!
This issue was closed by revision r1730.
